about.problemName: MS Geolife transportation mode prediction problem
about.problemDescription: The data contains GPS trajectory info collected in (Microsoft Research Asia) Geolife project by 182 users in a period of over three years (from April 2007 to August 2012). A GPS trajectory of this dataset is represented by a sequence of time-stamped points, each of which contains the information of latitude, longitude and altitude. This dataset contains a users trajectories labeled with transportation mode.
